info.description: API for the Book Rental System - a virtual library management system.
info.title: Book Rental System API

post.description: Authenticate user and return access & refresh tokens
Generate new access and refresh tokens using a valid refresh token
Register a new user with member role

get.description: Get a paginated list of all books

post.description: Create a new book in the catalog

get.description: Retrieve a single book by its ID

delete.description: Delete a book from the catalog

patch.description: Update the number of total and available copies of a book

get.description: Get a paginated list of categories
Get a list of all categories without pagination
Retrieve a single category by its ID

delete.description: Delete a category from the system

get.description: Get a paginated list of books filtered by category ID
Get a paginated list of all payments. Only admins can access this endpoint.

post.description: Create a new payment for the authenticated user

get.description: Get a paginated list of payments for a specific user. Users can only view their own payments unless they are admins/librarians.
Retrieve a single payment by its ID. Users can only view their own payments unless they are admins/librarians.

put.description: Refund a processed payment. Only admins and librarians can refund payments.

get.description: Get a paginated list of all rentals. Only admins and librarians can access this endpoint.

post.description: Create a new book rental for the authenticated user

get.description: Get a paginated list of rentals for a specific user. Users can only view their own rentals unless they are admins/librarians.
Retrieve a single rental by its ID. Users can only view their own rentals unless they are admins/librarians.

put.description: Extend a rental's due date by a specified number of days
Return a rented book, calculates any late fees if applicable

get.description: Retrieve a list of popular books based on rental frequency. Only accessible by admins and librarians.
Retrieve a list of books that are currently overdue. Only accessible by admins and librarians.
Retrieve a revenue report for a specific date range. Only accessible by admins.
Get a paginated list of all users. Only admins can access this endpoint.
Retrieve a single user by their ID. Users can only view their own profile unless they are admins.

put.description: Update a user's profile information. Users can only update their own profile unless they are admins. Only admins can update user roles.

delete.description: Delete a user from the system. Only admins can delete users.

post.description: Change a user's password. Users can only change their own password.

description.example: Books of fiction genre including novels, short stories, etc.

Bearer.description: JWT token for authentication. Use format: Bearer {token}
Bearer.name: Authorization
